## My Hello to You \~\~

Hello there! My name is Marzuki Nooranas - or *Marz* for short! I am currently in my 3rd year, double majoring in Sociology and Communications & New Media!

I have always been fascinated by how society functions and its intricate connections, my passion for understanding the world around us, is driven by a desire to foster meaningful connections within all communities!

## My overland journey from Singapore to Vietnam!

To demonstrate this, I embark of frequent backpacking trips across Southeast Asia, and actively engage myself in the cultures and learn about their customs.

Such experiences provide me with firsthand insights into how different societies interact, and not only broadening my horizons, but also fostering empathy across different communities. Here's a little snippet -
